abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would make available
            foreign exchange to finance priority import requirements of
            raw materials, spare parts, components, balancing equipment
            and export promotional services. Counterpart funds would be
            used to finance development projects in the Central
            Government budget. The project would increase the
            country's manufactured exports and generate additional employment.
